net.hudup.core.alg

Class KBaseRecommendIntegrated

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.hudup.core.alg.KBaseAbstract
      • net.hudup.core.alg.KBaseRecommendIntegrated
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, KBase
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SvdGradientKB

    public abstract class KBaseRecommendIntegrated
extends KBaseAbstract
    This abstract class models a so-called integrated KBase, which provides advances methods on knowledge base. For example, method estimate(int, int) estimates a rating value of specified user giving on specified item. Integrated KBase is often integrated with complex recommendation algorithms. Especially, any integrated KBase has internal data structure dependent on concrete application. The method destroyDataStructure() destroys such internal data structure when integrated KBase is closed.
    Version:
    10.0
    Author:
    Loc Nguyen
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Default constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • estimate

        public abstract double estimate(int userId,
                                int itemId)
        This method estimates a rating value of specified user giving on specified item. Because this method is abstract, any class extends KBaseRecommendIntegrated must complete it.
        Parameters:
        userId - specified user identifier (user ID).
        itemId - specified item identifier (item ID).
        Returns:
        estimated rating value.

      • learn

        public void learn(Dataset dataset,
                  Alg alg)
        Description copied from interface: KBase
        This method is responsible for creating KBase or learning from specified dataset. Because every model-based recommender owns distinguished KBase, the second parameter is such algorithm. The association between model-based recommender and KBase is tight. This method tells us that KBase can be learned by any approaches: machine learning, data mining, artificial intelligence, statistics, etc.
        Specified by:
        learn in interface KBase
        Overrides:
        learn in class KBaseAbstract
        Parameters:
        dataset - specified dataset.
        alg - the algorithm that owns this KBase.

      • learn0

        public abstract void learn0(Dataset dataset,
                            Alg alg)
        This method is responsible for creating KBase or learning from specified dataset according to specified algorithm. This method is called by learn(Dataset, Alg). Because this method is abstract, any class extends KBaseRecommendIntegrated must complete it.
        Parameters:
        dataset - specified dataset.
        alg - specified algorithm which is often a recommendation algorithm (called recommender).

      • learn0

        public abstract void learn0(RatingMatrix userRatingMatrix)
        This method is responsible for creating KBase or learning from specified user rating matrix. This method is called by learn(Dataset, Alg). Because this method is abstract, any class extends KBaseRecommendIntegrated must complete it.
        Parameters:
        userRatingMatrix - specified user rating matrix, represented by RatingMatrix. In user rating matrix, each row is a vector of rating values that a user gives on many items.

      • load

        public void load()
        Description copied from interface: KBase
        This method is used to read KBase from storage system. Storage system can be files, database, etc.
        Specified by:
        load in interface KBase
        Overrides:
        load in class KBaseAbstract

      • load0

        public abstract void load0()
        This method is responsible for creating KBase or learning from dataset specified in the configuration of KBaseRecommendIntegrated. Because this method is abstract, any class extends KBaseRecommendIntegrated must complete it.

      • export

        public void export(DataConfig storeConfig)
        Description copied from interface: KBase
        Getting the configuration of KBase by copying (exporting) the internal configuration to the specified configuration.
        Specified by:
        export in interface KBase
        Overrides:
        export in class KBaseAbstract
        Parameters:
        storeConfig - specified configuration where the internal configuration is copied.

      • export0

        public abstract void export0(DataConfig storeConfig)
        This method copies (exports) the internal configuration to the specified configuration. Because this method is abstract, any class extends KBaseRecommendIntegrated must complete it.
        Parameters:
        storeConfig - the configuration object to receive entries of the configuration of this knowledge base.

      • close

        public void close()
        Description copied from interface: KBase
        Close this KBase. After this method is called, KBase cannot be re-learned. It becomes garbage for system garbage collector.
        Specified by:
        close in interface KBase
        Overrides:
        close in class KBaseAbstract

      • destroyDataStructure

        protected abstract void destroyDataStructure()
        Especially, any integrated KBase has internal data structure dependent on concrete application. So this method destroys such internal data structure when integrated KBase is closed. Because this method is abstract, any class extends KBaseRecommendIntegrated must complete it.

      • getDefaultParameters

        public abstract PropList getDefaultParameters()
        Retrieving default parameters of KBaseRecommendIntegrated from its configuration. Because this method is abstract, any class extends KBaseRecommendIntegrated must complete it.
        Returns:
        default parameters stored in PropList.
